adHeader: Fun & Versatile Pianist / Piano Music for Your Event
adDetails: Looking for a pianist or accompanist for your wedding, graduation, or other event in SF Peninsula or Silicon Valley? 20 years of playing experience. I can set you up with any kind of program with you and work with your budget! You will need a piano at your venue. Classical, pop, jazz, movie music, anime, video game music, musicals... you name it, I can take care of it! **Repertoire is NOT limited to what's in the picture.** You can contact me via this post or via my website at www.gkpiano.com where you can hear samples. I also speak Japanese. 日本語も話せます。返事を楽しみにしております！ I look forward to making music with you! ----- Keywords: wedding, graduation, party, fun, repertoire, passionate, flexible, affordable, inspiring, wedding pianist, graduation pianist, party pianist, wedding piano player, graduation piano player, party piano player, fun pianist, piano music
